select
from SYS_SHOP
1=1
and SCENIC_SPOT_ID = #{scenicSpotId}
and SHOP_ID = #{shopId}
and SHOP_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{shopName},'%')
and SHOP_PHONE like CONCAT('%',#{shopPhone},'%')

SELECT SCENIC_SPOT_ID, SCENIC_SPOT_NAME, SCENIC_SPOT_CONTACT, SCENIC_SPOT_PHONE, SCENIC_SPOT_EMAIL, SCENIC_SPOT_ADDRES, SCENIC_SPOT_POSTAL_CODE, SCENIC_SPOT_ROBOT_TOTAL, SCENIC_SPOT_STATUS, SCENIC_SPOT_OPENWORD, SCENIC_SPOT_CLOSEWORD, SCENIC_SPOT_BEYOND_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_RENT_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_RENT_PRICE, SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_TIME, SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_TIME, SCENIC_SPOT_REMAINING_TIME, SCENIC_SPOT_RENT_TIME, COORDINATE_RANGE, SCENIC_SPOT_DEPOSIT, NORMAL_CAPPED_PRICE, WEEKEND_CAPPED_PRICE, RANDOM_BROADCAST_TIME, ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS, SCENIC_SPOT_THE_SERVER, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, SCENIC_SPOT_FID, SCENIC_SPOT_FREQUENCY, SCENIC_SPOT_FENCE_TIME, SCENIC_SPOT_FORBIDDEN_ZONE_TIME, TEST_START_TIME, TRIAL_OPERATIONS_TIME, FORMAL_OPERATION_TIME, STOP_OPERATION_TIME, COMPANY_ID, PAUSE_STATE, WORK_TIME, CLOSING_TIME, PAUSE_BROADCAST, WORK_BROADCAST, CLOSING_BROADCAST, LAMP_OPENING_TIME, LAMP_CLOSING_TIME, LAMP_LIGHTING_TIME, FREE_TIME_SETTING, GIFT_TIME_SETTING, GIFT_USAGE_SETTING FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT

SELECT A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID, A.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME, A.SCENIC_SPOT_CONTACT, A.SCENIC_SPOT_PHONE, A.SCENIC_SPOT_EMAIL, A.SCENIC_SPOT_ADDRES, A.SCENIC_SPOT_POSTAL_CODE, A.SCENIC_SPOT_ROBOT_TOTAL, A.SCENIC_SPOT_STATUS, A.SCENIC_SPOT_OPENWORD, A.SCENIC_SPOT_CLOSEWORD, A.SCENIC_SPOT_BEYOND_PRICE, A.SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_PRICE, A.SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_PRICE, A.SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_RENT_PRICE, A.SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_RENT_PRICE, A.SCENIC_SPOT_WEEKEND_TIME, A.SCENIC_SPOT_NORMAL_TIME, A.SCENIC_SPOT_REMAINING_TIME, A.SCENIC_SPOT_RENT_TIME, A.COORDINATE_RANGE, A.SCENIC_SPOT_DEPOSIT, A.NORMAL_CAPPED_PRICE, A.WEEKEND_CAPPED_PRICE, A.RANDOM_BROADCAST_TIME, A.ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS, A.CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATE_DATE, A.SCENIC_SPOT_FID, A.SCENIC_SPOT_FREQUENCY, A.SCENIC_SPOT_FENCE_TIME, A.SCENIC_SPOT_FORBIDDEN_ZONE_TIME, A.TEST_START_TIME, A.TRIAL_OPERATIONS_TIME, A.FORMAL_OPERATION_TIME, A.STOP_OPERATION_TIME, B.SCENIC_SPOT_FNAME, COUNT(C.SCENIC_SPOT_ID) AS total FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT A LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_BINDING B ON A.SCENIC_SPOT_FID = B.SCENIC_SPOT_FID LEFT JOIN SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_BROADCAST C ON A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID = C.SCENIC_SPOT_ID
B.SCENIC_SPOT_TYPE = 1 AND A.ROBOT_WAKEUP_WORDS = 1
AND B.SCENIC_SPOT_FNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scenicSpotFname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
AND A.SCENIC_SPOT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{scenicSpotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
GROUP BY A.SCENIC_SPOT_ID ORDER BY A.CREATE_DATE DESC
